name: [HAProxy] High number of backend denied responses for host: {{host.name}}
query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:haproxy.backend.denied.resp_rate{*} by {host}, 'agile', 2, direction='above', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
message:
The number of backend denied responses due to security restrictions for host: {{host.name}} is above normal.

A malicious attacker or misconfigured application could be to blame. More information on designing ACLs for HAProxy can be found in the [Introduction to HAProxy ACLs blog post](https://www.haproxy.com/blog/introduction-to-haproxy-acls/).

recommended_monitor_metadata.description: Notifies when HAProxy denined backend responses are higher than usual for a specific host.
